abstract: New York Philharmonic is bracing for anticipated period of upheaval; will be displaced for two seasons while its aging home at Avery Fisher Hall is renovated; must raise hundreds of millions to pay for renovation and shore up persistently tenuous coffers, and must find someone to succeed music director Alan Gilbert, who is departing in 2017; any of these hurdles is difficult in itself, but facing all simultaneously is daunting.
lead_paragraph: A major renovation and finding a replacement for Alan Gilbert are just two of the major issues confronting the orchestra.

headline.main: New York Philharmonic’s Challenges Go Beyond the Music
headline.print_headline: Philharmonic’s Challenges Go Beyond the Music

snippet: A major renovation and finding a replacement for Alan Gilbert are just two of the major issues confronting the orchestra.
